Description:
who you areYou must be a qualified and experienced clinical psychologist with experience in working with people who require counseling on various concerns to join its growing team in Dubai. You must have an exciting far-reaching vision for transforming mental health in the region and beyond, anchored in exemplary client service, unmatched professional development and deep community involvement.Skills & competencies:specific expertise in one or more of the follow areas is a plus:Psycho-educational assesments
parenting
working with children under 12 years old
ability to provide client service in arabic is a plus (not required).
experience working with culturally and linguistically diverse populations
experience with clinical supervisionEducations & qualifications:Master's or doctorate level qualification in clinical or counselling psychology
specialized training and a minimum of 3 years of work experience for doctorate and 5 years for master's level, including at least 1 year of experience in working with people with eating disorders.
Qualifications from UK/USA/Western Europe/Australia/South Africa is preferred.Job Details
